title: How to Draw a Cute Maltese Dog Face

steps.headline: Draw a smaller circle inside the big one.
steps.description: This is the muzzle. Placement depends on which way you want your Maltese to face.

steps.headline: Add a tiny circle inside the little circle.
Draw two tiny circles on top of the little circle.
Draw two ovals on either side of the largest circle.
Draw a fuzzy line around her head and lengthen the ears with it until they go down past her muzzle.
Lengthen the hair on her muzzle by adding the fuzzy line.
Add a slightly curved line under the nose.
Add a little topknot to the top of her head.
Erase the extra lines.
steps.description: Refine the fuzzy lines. Add pupils. Shade as desired.

tyn: colored pencils or crayons (to color her eyes)
text: Draw a circle.  Draw a smaller circle inside the big one. This is the muzzle. Placement depends on which way you want your Maltese to face. Add a tiny circle inside the little circle. This is the nose. Draw two tiny circles on top of the little circle. These are her eyes. Draw two ovals on either side of the largest circle. These are her ears. Erase any overlapping lines.  Draw a fuzzy line around her head and lengthen the ears with it until they go down past her muzzle.  Lengthen the hair on her muzzle by adding the fuzzy line.  Add a slightly curved line under the nose. This is her mouth. Add a little topknot to the top of her head.  Erase the extra lines. Refine the fuzzy lines. Add pupils. Shade as desired. Finished.
sentences: Draw a smaller circle inside the big one.
Placement depends on which way you want your Maltese to face.
Add a tiny circle inside the little circle.
Draw two tiny circles on top of the little circle.
Draw two ovals on either side of the largest circle.
Draw a fuzzy line around her head and lengthen the ears with it until they go down past her muzzle.
Lengthen the hair on her muzzle by adding the fuzzy line.
Add a slightly curved line under the nose.
Add a little topknot to the top of her head.
